text: Ani (yakuba) mhanale, he majhya mulanno! Tumhi sarva ekaca daratuna pravesa karu naka, kimbahuna aneka darammadhuna vegavegale ho'una pravesa kara. Mi allahatarphe alelya konatyahi gostila tumacya varuna talu sakata nahi. Adesa kevala allahacaca calato, majha sampurna visvasa tyacyavaraca ahe ani pratyeka bharosa thevanaryane tyacyavaraca bharosa thevala pahije
